text: Yananya is a girl name.It has the common English spelling of two Indian given names: the masculine यनन् and the feminine यनन्या' .This name is unique.The word Yananya has multiple meanings: Hindu girl's name: Means Beautiful person Arabic word: Means love or blessing of god Tamil word : "யணன்" Means beauty - அழகான. In BhuSthuthi by Swami Desikan SHLOKAM 24 निः संशयैः निगम सीमनि विष्णु पत्नि प्रख्यापितं भृगु मुखैर् मुनिभिः प्रतीतैः । पश्यन्त्यनन्य परधी रस संस्तुतेन सन्तः समाधि नयनेन तवानु भावम् ॥ २४ ॥ niH saMshayaiH nigama siimani viShNu patni prakhyaapitaM bhR^igu mukhair.h munibhiH pratiitaiH. pashyant.h yananya paradhii rasa saMstutena santaH samaadhi nayanena tavaanu bhaavam.h.. 24 This shlokam describes how BhUmi Devi becomes the target of the meditation by Yogis. The key words here are: "Santha:Tava anubhAvam samAdhi nayan Ena pasyanthy" (The blemishless ones visualize You with the power of meditation). The meaning of name "Yananya" is "beautiful person or blessing of god". https://www.timesnownews.com/baby-names/meaning-of- yananya#:~:text=%3A-,yananya,Unique%2C%20Different%20from%20others%2C%20Charming == References == Category:Given names
title: Yananya
